inclusion.criterion: pathologically confirmed, previously untreated or refractory/relapsed ENKTL as defined by the World Health Organization classification
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0-2
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: adequate haematologic function (haemoglobin > 9.0 g/l, absolute neutrophil count >1500/ml, platelets > 75,000/l)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: adequate hepatic function (total serum bilirubin ≤ 1.5 times the upper limit of normal, alanine aminotransferase and aspartate aminotransferase ≤ 2.5 times the upper limit of normal)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: adequate renal function (serum creatinine ≤ 1.5 mg/dl, creatinine clearance ≥ 50 ml/min)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: normal coagulation function and electrocardiogram results
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prior chemotherapy and radiotherapy should have been completed >4 weeks earlier
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willingness to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
